name: ChordsBuddy
0:
”Alexa open Chords Buddy”
”Alexa tell Chords Buddy to play C major”
”Alexa ask Chords Buddy to play D”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chords buddy
des: A skill to learn how notes and chords sound, and develop your ear for music and your perfect pitch. Ask Chord Buddy to play a chord, for example 'Alexa, Ask Chords Buddy to play C Major' and you will hear the chord played by an acoustic guitar. Chord Buddy supports the following chord variations: Major, Minor, Major Seventh, Minor Seventh, Dominant Seventh, Major Sixth, Minor Sixth, Sus 2, Sus 4, augmented and diminished chords. Current version does not support sharps or flats.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
